abstract: Autumn Unfolds: The sky is an intense blue, the leaves have become deep enough to slosh around in, and there is a surprising sound, one held over from summer.
snippet: Autumn Unfolds: The sky is an intense blue, the leaves have become deep enough to slosh around in, and there is a surprising sound, one held over from summer.
lead_paragraph: See a larger version of the forest from this week. Compare with the blow-up of last week.
